the original mean judge Simon Cowell . Over the past nine seasons, the smug Brit with the snug V-necks has become famous for comparing one contestant to "a cat being thrown off a skyscraper," telling another, Don't mean to be rude, but you look like the Hulk's wife, reducing dozens of hopefuls to their worst "ugly cry"- and propelling the show to the No. 1 spot in the process. But Simon Cowell won't be back for the 10th season, which premieres Wednesday

: GOP relieved I'm gone Mike Pence Steele, the newly ousted chairman of the Republican National Committee, said he's "disappointed" he lost the recent election but that many in his party are relieved. also was asked with how he deals with the criticism that comes his way. "In this country, you have the freedom of speech and you can say whatever you want," he said. As long as you say it to the right people, not bluntly put out in my face, then it don't make me any difference. People can say anything they want. They can have their own opinions, but it doesn't mean it's valid... It motivates me.
